title: Who is the real Elvira Nabiullina? : Planet Money : NPR

quotes: Nabiullina graduated from Moscow State University in 1986.

Over the next twelve years, she worked her way up through the USSR Science and Industry Union and its successor, the Russian Union of Industrialists and Entrepreneurs, and then through the ministry for economic development and trade.
then it was back to the ministry in 2000 as first deputy, after Vladimir Putin became prime minister the previous year.
